ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Feedback on implementing client side HTTP caching
ygData.msgSnippet: Any reason why a forward proxy cache would not work? For instance you could set up squid or traffic server as a forward proxy. Subbu

Any reason why a forward proxy cache would not work? For instance you could=
 set up squid or traffic server as a forward proxy.

Subbu
